projects.title: To Do Game Project
projects.description: This is my first ever project made with Ruby and Gosu. This app combines the functionality of a to-do application with a fun twist. With this app, users can earn coins each time they complete a task. It offers the basic features of task management, allowing users to create and delete tasks. Additionally, the app enhances the user experience with a lofi music background, which can be paused if desired. This simple yet engaging app makes task completion more enjoyable while keeping users productive.
